title: Inverse problems in electrolysers
summary: We investigate the relationship between the electric potential within an electrolyser cell and its temperature and particle concentrations. Specifically, we identify the measurements required to uniquely reconstruct the potential $φ$ as a function of temperature and concentration.

AI.tldr: 研究电解槽内电势与温度、粒子浓度之间的关系，确定唯一重构电势函数所需测量参数
AI.motivation: 理解电解槽中电势如何随温度和浓度变化，为电解过程优化和控制提供理论基础
AI.method: 通过理论分析确定唯一重构电势函数φ(T,c)所需的最小测量数据集
AI.result: 识别出能够唯一确定电势函数的具体测量要求
AI.conclusion: 建立了电解槽电势与温度、浓度关系的测量框架，为实验设计和过程监控提供指导

title: Self-similar extinction for a fast diffusion equation with weighted absorption
summary: Finite time extinction of any bounded solution to the fast diffusion equation with spatially inhomogeneous absorption $$ \partial_tu=Δu^m-|x|^σu^p, \quad (x,t)\in\mathbb{R}^N\times(0,\infty), $$ with $N\geq1$ and exponents $$ p>1, \quad m_c=\frac{(N-2)_+}{N}<m<1, \quad σ>σ_*:=\frac{2(p-1)}{1-m}, $$ is established. Moreover, the existence of self-similar solutions of the form $$ U(x,t)=(T-t)^αf(|x|(T-t)^β), \quad α=\frac{σ+2}{(1-m)(σ-σ_*)}, \ β=\frac{p-m}{(1-m)(σ-σ_*)}, $$ with $f(0)>0$, $f'(0)=0$ and $$ \lim\limits_{ξ\to\infty}ξ^{(σ+2)/(p-m)}f(ξ)=L\in(0,\infty). $$ is proved, together with some unbounded self-similar solutions as well. The property of finite time extinction is in striking contrast to the standard fast diffusion equation with absorption (that is, $σ=0$), where the strict positivity of solutions for any $t\in(0,\infty)$ is well-known.

AI.tldr: 研究快速扩散方程在空间非均匀吸收项下的有限时间熄灭现象，证明了有界解在有限时间内熄灭，并构造了自相似解
AI.motivation: 研究带有空间非均匀吸收项（|x|^σ u^p）的快速扩散方程，探索其与标准吸收项（σ=0）的差异。标准情况下解始终为正，而空间非均匀吸收可能导致有限时间熄灭
AI.method: 通过分析方程 ∂_t u = Δu^m - |x|^σ u^p，在参数范围 p>1, m_c < m < 1, σ > σ_* 下，建立有界解的有限时间熄灭性质。构造自相似解 U(x,t) = (T-t)^α f(|x|(T-t)^β)，并证明其存在性
AI.result: 证明了有界解在有限时间内熄灭，构造了具有特定渐近行为的自相似解，并发现了无界自相似解。这与σ=0时解始终为正的标准结果形成鲜明对比
AI.conclusion: 空间非均匀吸收项（|x|^σ）显著改变了快速扩散方程的解行为，导致有限时间熄灭现象，这与均匀吸收情况有本质区别

title: Divergence-form equations admitting nowhere $C^1$ Lipschitz weak solutions
summary: We study a class of partial differential equations in divergence form that admit highly irregular Lipschitz weak solutions. By reformulating these divergence-form equations as a first-order partial differential relation and adapting the convex integration scheme recently developed in \cite{GKY26} for irregular diffusion equations, we show that the same structural Condition~$O_N$ introduced there also ensures the existence of Lipschitz weak solutions that are nowhere $C^1$ for the corresponding time-independent equations in bounded domains, under suitable boundary data. In particular, for the smooth strongly polyconvex functions on $\mathbb{R}^{2\times n}$ constructed in that paper for all $n \ge 2$, the associated Euler--Lagrange equations admit Lipschitz weak solutions that are nowhere $C^1$ and satisfy zero boundary conditions in any bounded domain of $\mathbb{R}^n$. Our approach relies on new building blocks constructed from the same wave cone and $\mathcal{T}_N$-configurations employed in the analysis of diffusion equations.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究一类散度形式的偏微分方程，通过凸积分方法证明了在特定结构条件下，这些方程存在高度不规则的Lipschitz弱解，这些解在任何点都不是C¹光滑的。
AI.motivation: 研究散度形式偏微分方程中高度不规则Lipschitz弱解的存在性，特别是对于时间独立方程在边界条件下的非光滑解。
AI.method: 将散度形式方程重新表述为一阶偏微分关系，并采用最近为不规则扩散方程开发的凸积分方案。利用相同的波锥和𝒯_N配置构造新的构建块。
AI.result: 证明了对于所有n≥2，在ℝ^{2×n}上构造的光滑强多凸函数，相关的Euler-Lagrange方程在任何有界域中都存在处处非C¹的Lipschitz弱解，且满足零边界条件。
AI.conclusion: 相同的结构条件O_N确保了时间独立方程在适当边界数据下存在高度不规则的Lipschitz弱解，扩展了凸积分方法在散度形式方程中的应用。

title: Asymptotic stability of symmetric flows with viscous inflow boundary condition
summary: We study the two-dimensional incompressible Navier-Stokes equations in a channel $Ω=(0,L)\times(0,H)$ with small viscosity $\varepsilon\ll1$, an $\varepsilon$-Navier slip condition on the horizontal walls, and a viscous inflow condition for the perturbation stream function. For a broad class of symmetric base profiles $u_0(y)$ vanishing on the walls, we construct an exact steady solution $(u_s,v_s)$ that is $O(\varepsilon^{1/3})$-close to the shear $(u_0,0)$. We then develop a new weighted vorticity energy method to prove uniform linear stability and enhanced dissipation: perturbations decay exponentially in a weighted $L^2$ norm on the time scale $O(\varepsilon^{-1/3})$. In the short-channel regime $L\ll1$, the method yields nonlinear asymptotic stability with threshold $O(\varepsilon^{2/3})$. In the long-channel regime, assuming concavity together with a spectral condition, we introduce a quantity \textit{Rayleigh vorticity} to control the non-favorable terms and obtain nonlinear stability with threshold $O(\varepsilon^{5/6+})$.

AI.tldr: 研究二维不可压缩Navier-Stokes方程在小粘度、滑移边界条件下的精确稳态解构造及其稳定性分析
AI.motivation: 研究小粘度Navier-Stokes方程在滑移边界条件下的精确稳态解存在性及其稳定性，特别关注边界层效应和增强耗散现象
AI.method: 构造接近剪切流的精确稳态解，发展新的加权涡量能量方法，分析线性稳定性，并在短通道和长通道两种情况下分别研究非线性稳定性
AI.result: 成功构造了O(ε^{1/3})接近剪切流的精确稳态解，证明了均匀线性稳定性和增强耗散（时间尺度O(ε^{-1/3})），在短通道下获得O(ε^{2/3})非线性稳定性阈值，在长通道下获得O(ε^{5/6+})非线性稳定性阈值
AI.conclusion: 该研究为小粘度Navier-Stokes方程在滑移边界条件下的稳定性分析提供了新的理论框架，证明了精确稳态解的存在性和多种稳定性结果，特别在边界层控制方面取得了重要进展

title: On sliding methods for mixed local and nonlocal equations and Gibbons' conjecture
summary:
We investigate elliptic and parabolic equations involving mixed local and nonlocal operators of the form $(-Δ)^s-Δ$, as well as their parabolic counterparts with both the Marchaud fractional time derivative and the classical first-order derivative.
  A major difficulty in this setting stems from the coexistence of operators with different nonlocal structures and incompatible scaling properties, which obstruct the direct use of classical sliding methods. To address this issue, we develop a refined sliding method suited to mixed local-nonlocal operators. As key technical ingredients, we establish new generalized weighted average inequalities, narrow region principles, and maximum principles in bounded and unbounded domains.
  These tools enable us to derive monotonicity and one-dimensional symmetry results for mixed elliptic equations in bounded domains, half-spaces, and the whole space, and to extend the analysis to parabolic equations with mixed time derivatives. As an application, we resolve the Gibbons' conjecture for a class of mixed fractional equations.

AI.tldr: 本文针对混合局部-非局部算子(-Δ)^s-Δ及其抛物型方程，开发了改进的滑动方法，建立了加权平均不等式、窄区域原理等工具，解决了Gibbons猜想。
AI.motivation: 混合局部-非局部算子（如(-Δ)^s-Δ）及其抛物型方程在数学物理中有重要应用，但不同算子的非局部结构和不相容的尺度性质共存，阻碍了经典滑动方法的直接应用，需要开发新的分析工具。
AI.method: 开发了适用于混合局部-非局部算子的改进滑动方法，建立了广义加权平均不等式、窄区域原理、有界和无界区域的最大值原理等关键技术工具。
AI.result: 在有界域、半空间和全空间中得到了混合椭圆方程的单调性和一维对称性结果，并将分析扩展到混合时间导数的抛物型方程，解决了混合分数阶方程的Gibbons猜想。
AI.conclusion: 通过开发新的滑动方法和建立关键技术工具，成功克服了混合局部-非局部算子分析中的困难，为这类方程的研究提供了系统的理论框架，并解决了重要的Gibbons猜想问题。

title: Landau-de Gennes Energy with Weak Planar Anchoring
summary: We study global minimizers of the Landau-de Gennes energy for the nematic liquid crystals in simply connected, bounded, smooth domains of dimension 3, subject to a weak planar anchoring. The boundary condition is degenerate. In the regime where the elastic constant tends to zero and the temperature is below the nematic-isotropic transition threshold, the bulk and surface energy enforce the energy minimizers to be uniaxial, with director fields lying in the tangent plane to the boundary in the sense of trace. We establish that the singular set of the limiting minimizer within the closure of the domain is a finite set by studying the associated harmonic map with a strong tangential boundary constraint. The structure of the singularities located on the boundary is also investigated.

AI.tldr: 研究三维有界光滑区域中向列相液晶的Landau-de Gennes能量全局极小值，在弱平面锚定边界条件下，当弹性常数趋于零且温度低于向列-各向同性转变阈值时，分析极小值的奇异集结构。
AI.motivation: 研究向列相液晶在弱平面锚定边界条件下的能量极小化问题，特别关注弹性常数趋于零时极小值的奇异集结构，这对理解液晶缺陷的形成和分布有重要意义。
AI.method: 采用Landau-de Gennes能量模型，在弹性常数趋于零的极限下，将问题转化为研究具有强切向边界约束的调和映射的奇异集结构，分析边界奇异点的性质。
AI.result: 证明了在区域闭包内，极限极小值的奇异集是一个有限点集，并研究了位于边界上的奇异点的结构。
AI.conclusion: 在弱平面锚定边界条件下，当弹性常数趋于零时，Landau-de Gennes能量极小值的奇异集是有限的，边界奇异点具有特定结构，这为液晶缺陷理论提供了重要数学基础。

title: Derivation of variational membrane models in the context of anisotropic nonlocal hyperelasticity
summary: Motivated by the analysis of thin structures, we study the variational dimension reduction of hyperelastic energies involving nonlocal gradients to an effective membrane model. When rescaling the thin domain, isotropic interaction ranges naturally become anisotropic, leading to the development of a theory for anisotropic nonlocal gradients with direction-dependent interaction ranges. Unlike existing nonlocal derivatives with finite horizon, which are defined via interaction kernels supported on balls of positive radius, our formulation is based on ellipsoidal interaction regions whose principal radii may vanish independently. This yields a unified framework that interpolates between fully nonlocal, partially nonlocal, and purely local models. Employing these tools, we present a $Γ$-convergence analysis for the nonlocal thin-film energies. The limit functional retains the structural form of the classical membrane energy, and the classical local model is recovered precisely when all interaction radii vanish.

AI.tldr: 研究薄结构分析中的非局部梯度超弹性能量变分降维到有效膜模型，提出基于椭球相互作用区域的各向异性非局部梯度理论，建立了从完全非局部到局部模型的统一框架。
AI.motivation: 受薄结构分析的驱动，研究涉及非局部梯度的超弹性能量的变分降维问题。当缩放薄域时，各向同性相互作用范围自然变为各向异性，需要发展方向相关相互作用范围的各向异性非局部梯度理论。
AI.method: 提出基于椭球相互作用区域的各向异性非局部梯度理论，其主半径可以独立消失。使用Γ-收敛分析非局部薄膜能量，建立从完全非局部、部分非局部到纯局部模型的统一框架。
AI.result: 极限泛函保持了经典膜能量的结构形式，当所有相互作用半径消失时精确恢复经典局部模型。建立了非局部薄膜能量的Γ-收敛分析结果。
AI.conclusion: 提出了各向异性非局部梯度的统一理论框架，成功将非局部超弹性能量降维到有效膜模型，为薄结构分析提供了从非局部到局部模型的连续过渡理论。

title: Singular convergence for semilinear wave equations with steep potential well
summary: We consider a semilinear wave equation in the whole space with a deep potential well. We prove that as the depth of the well tends to infinity, the solutions of the equation converge to the solutions of a wave equation defined on the bottom of the well, with Dirichlet condition on the boundary.

AI.tldr: 研究带深势阱的半线性波动方程，证明当势阱深度趋于无穷时，解收敛到底部定义的波动方程解，并满足边界Dirichlet条件
AI.motivation: 研究势阱深度趋于无穷时波动方程解的渐近行为，探索从全空间方程到有界区域方程的极限过程
AI.method: 分析带深势阱的半线性波动方程，通过数学分析证明当势阱深度趋于无穷时解的收敛性
AI.result: 证明了当势阱深度趋于无穷时，原方程的解收敛到势阱底部定义的波动方程解，且满足边界Dirichlet条件
AI.conclusion: 深势阱极限下，全空间波动方程收敛到有界区域上的波动方程，为这类渐近分析提供了理论基础

title: Instability of two-pulse periodic waves with long wavelength in some Hamiltonian PDEs
summary: We consider quasilinear generalizations of the Korteweg-de Vries equation and dispersive perturbations of the Euler equations for compressible fluids, either in Lagrangian or in Eulerian coordinates. In particular, our framework includes hydrodynamic formulation of the nonlinear Schrödinger equations. The periodic waves we study exhibit on each period two pulses, one converging to a bright soliton and one converging to a dark soliton, when wavelength goes to infinity. We show that such waves, for sufficiently large periods, are spectrally unstable. To do so, we combine two approaches. The first one is to calculate the asymptotic expansion of the Hessian matrix of the action integral and concludes using arXiv:1505.01382 as in arXiv:1710.03936 . This shows instability when both limiting solitary waves are stable. The second approach studies the convergence of the spectrum when the period goes to infinity and is applied in remaining cases, when one of the solitary waves is unstable. To carry out the latter, we prove the convergence of an appropriate renormalization of the periodic Evans function as in arXiv:1802.02830 .

AI.tldr: 研究准线性KdV方程和可压缩流体欧拉方程色散扰动的周期波，这些波在每个周期内包含两个脉冲（分别收敛于亮孤子和暗孤子），证明在周期足够大时这些波是谱不稳定的。
AI.motivation: 研究准线性KdV方程和可压缩流体欧拉方程色散扰动中的周期波稳定性问题，特别关注包含亮孤子和暗孤子特征的周期波，这些波在非线性薛定谔方程的流体力学表述中具有重要意义。
AI.method: 采用两种方法结合：1）计算作用积分Hessian矩阵的渐近展开，利用已有理论框架判断稳定性；2）研究周期趋于无穷时谱的收敛性，通过证明周期Evans函数的适当重整化的收敛性来分析不稳定性。
AI.result: 证明这类周期波在周期足够大时是谱不稳定的，无论其极限孤子波是稳定还是不稳定的情况都能覆盖。
AI.conclusion: 准线性KdV方程和可压缩流体欧拉方程色散扰动中的周期波，当每个周期包含分别收敛于亮孤子和暗孤子的两个脉冲时，在足够大的周期下总是谱不稳定的。

title: On the classical Reinforcement problem and Optimisation
summary: In the present survey, we consider the classical reinforcement problem for elliptic boundary value problems originally studied by Sanchez-Palencia in 1969. We focus on the seminar papers by Brezis, Caffarelli, & Friedman, and by Acerbi & Buttazzo, and discuss the related optimisation problems proposed by Friedman and by Buttazzo.

AI.tldr: 本文综述了椭圆边值问题的经典强化问题，重点分析了Brezis、Caffarelli、Friedman以及Acerbi、Buttazzo的经典论文，并讨论了Friedman和Buttazzo提出的相关优化问题。
AI.motivation: 回顾椭圆边值问题强化理论的历史发展，特别是Sanchez-Palencia于1969年开创性工作后的重要进展，梳理该领域的核心文献和理论框架。
AI.method: 采用文献综述方法，系统分析Brezis、Caffarelli、Friedman以及Acerbi、Buttazzo的经典论文，比较不同强化理论方法，并探讨相关的优化问题。
AI.result: 梳理了椭圆边值问题强化理论的发展脉络，明确了各经典论文的理论贡献，建立了从Sanchez-Palencia原始工作到后续优化问题发展的完整理论框架。
AI.conclusion: 椭圆边值问题的强化理论经过多年发展已形成系统理论体系，Brezis、Caffarelli、Friedman以及Acerbi、Buttazzo的工作是该领域的重要里程碑，相关优化问题为应用研究提供了理论基础。

title: Asymptotic analysis for heterogeneous elastic energies with material voids
summary: We study the effective behavior of heterogeneous energies arising in the modeling of material voids in geometrically linear elastic materials. Specifically, we consider functionals featuring bulk terms depending on the symmetrized gradient of the displacement and terms comparable to the surface area of the material voids inside the material. Under suitable growth conditions for the bulk and surface densities we prove that, as the microscale $\varepsilon$ tends to zero, the $Γ$-limit admits an integral representation that contains an additional surface term expressed by jump discontinuities of the displacement outside of the void region. This term is related to the phenomenon of collapsing of voids in the effective limit. Under a continuity assumption of the surface density at the $\varepsilon$-scale, we show that the limiting density related to jumps is twice the energy density for voids.

AI.tldr: 研究含孔洞几何线性弹性材料异质能量的有效行为，证明Γ-极限包含由孔洞塌陷引起的位移跳跃项
AI.motivation: 研究含孔洞材料在微观尺度下的有效力学行为，特别是孔洞塌陷对宏观能量泛函的影响
AI.method: 使用Γ-收敛理论分析含孔洞弹性材料能量泛函的极限行为，考虑体能量项和孔洞表面积项
AI.result: 当微观尺度ε→0时，Γ-极限包含额外的表面项，该表面项由孔洞区域外的位移跳跃表示，与孔洞塌陷现象相关
AI.conclusion: 在表面密度连续性假设下，极限跳跃密度是孔洞能量密度的两倍，揭示了孔洞塌陷对宏观材料行为的定量影响

title: Anisotropic Maximal $L^p$-regularity Estimates for a Hypoelliptic Operator
summary: We consider the maximal regularity of a specific Vlasov-Fokker-Planck equation $\mathcal{A}u=f$ in the Euclidean space. The operator $\mathcal{A}=Δ_{y}u-y\cdot \nabla_x{u}$ is an example of the Ornstein-Uhlenbeck operators. We prove the existence of a solution that satisfies the anisotropic maximal regularity estimates. To prove this we also show a similar estimates and a weak (1, 1) estimate for $L=\partial_t-\mathcal{A}$, which is of independent interest. These results rely on the pointwise estimates of the fundamental solution of $L$.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了欧几里得空间中特定Vlasov-Fokker-Planck方程的最大正则性，证明了满足各向异性最大正则性估计的解的存在性，并建立了相关弱(1,1)估计。
AI.motivation: 研究Vlasov-Fokker-Planck方程的最大正则性，该方程中的算子属于Ornstein-Uhlenbeck算子类，在统计物理和随机过程中有重要应用。
AI.method: 通过分析算子L=∂t-𝒜的基本解的点估计，建立各向异性最大正则性估计和弱(1,1)估计。
AI.result: 证明了满足各向异性最大正则性估计的解的存在性，同时建立了算子L的类似估计和弱(1,1)估计。
AI.conclusion: 成功解决了特定Vlasov-Fokker-Planck方程的最大正则性问题，相关估计方法具有独立的研究价值。

title: Wave front set of solutions to the fractional Schrödinger equation
summary:
In this paper, we characterize the wave front sets of solutions to fractional Schrödinger equations \(i\partial_{t}u =(-Δ)^{θ/2}u + V(x)u\)
  with $0<θ<2$ via the wave packet transform (short-time Fourier transform). We clarify the relationship between the order \(θ\) of the fractional Laplacian and the growth rate of the potential in the problem of propagation of singularities. In particular, we present a theorem that bridges the propagation mechanisms of singularities for the Schrödinger and wave equations.

AI.tldr: 通过波包变换分析分数阶薛定谔方程解的波前集，揭示分数阶拉普拉斯算子阶数θ与势函数增长速率对奇异性传播的影响，建立薛定谔方程与波动方程奇异性传播机制的桥梁。
AI.motivation: 研究分数阶薛定谔方程解的奇异性传播问题，特别是分数阶拉普拉斯算子阶数θ与势函数增长速率如何影响奇异性传播，旨在建立薛定谔方程与波动方程奇异性传播机制之间的联系。
AI.method: 使用波包变换（短时傅里叶变换）来刻画分数阶薛定谔方程解的波前集，通过分析算子阶数θ和势函数V(x)的增长特性来研究奇异性传播机制。
AI.result: 明确了分数阶拉普拉斯算子阶数θ与势函数增长速率在奇异性传播问题中的关系，提出了一个定理来桥接薛定谔方程和波动方程的奇异性传播机制。
AI.conclusion: 通过波包变换成功刻画了分数阶薛定谔方程解的波前集，建立了分数阶参数θ、势函数增长与奇异性传播之间的定量关系，为理解薛定谔方程与波动方程奇异性传播的统一框架提供了理论基础。

title: Isoperimetric inequalities for the lowest magnetic Steklov eigenvalue
summary: This paper studies the optimization of the lowest eigenvalue of the magnetic Steklov problem on planar domains. In the bounded domain setting and for magnetic fields of moderate strengths, we prove that among all simply-connected smooth domains of given area, the disk maximises the lowest magnetic Steklov eigenvalue. For exterior domains, we establish a similar isoperimetric inequality for magnetic fields of moderate strength under fixed perimeter constraint and additional geometric and symmetry assumptions. The proofs rely on the method of torsion-type trial functions in the bounded domain case and on the method of trial functions dependent only on the distance to the boundary in the exterior domain case.

AI.tldr: 研究平面区域上磁Steklov问题最小特征值的优化问题，证明在给定面积下，圆盘使有界单连通区域的最小磁Steklov特征值最大化；对于外部区域，在固定周长和几何对称性假设下，建立类似的等周不等式。
AI.motivation: 研究磁Steklov问题最小特征值的优化问题，探索在给定几何约束下（如面积或周长），哪种形状能使该特征值最大化，这是等周型不等式在磁Steklov问题中的推广。
AI.method: 对有界区域使用扭转型试验函数方法；对外部区域使用仅依赖于边界距离的试验函数方法。两种方法都针对中等强度的磁场。
AI.result: 1. 有界单连通区域：在给定面积下，圆盘使最小磁Steklov特征值最大化。2. 外部区域：在固定周长、几何对称性假设和中等强度磁场下，建立类似的等周不等式。
AI.conclusion: 圆盘在优化磁Steklov问题最小特征值方面具有最优性，这扩展了经典等周不等式到磁Steklov问题的结果，为相关物理和数学问题提供了理论基础。

title: Construction of two-bubble blow-up solutions for the mass-critical gKdV equations
summary: For the mass-critical generalized Korteweg-de Vries equation, $$ \partial_{t}u+\partial_{x}\left( \partial_{x}^{2}u+u^{5}\right)=0,\quad (t,x)\in [0,\infty)\times \mathbb{R}.$$ We prove the existence of a global solution that blows up in infinite time and approaches the sum of two decoupled bubbles with opposite signs. The proof is inspired by the techniques developed for the two-dimensional mass-critical NLS equation in a similar context by Martel-Raphaël [37]. The main difficulty originates from the fact that the unstable directions related to scaling are excited by the nonlinear interactions. To overcome this difficulty, a refined approximate solution that involves some non-localized profiles is needed. In particular, a sharp understanding for the interactions between solitons and such profiles is also required.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了质量临界广义KdV方程存在全局解，该解在无限时间内爆破并趋近于两个符号相反、解耦的气泡之和。
AI.motivation: 研究质量临界广义KdV方程中无限时间爆破解的动力学行为，特别是两个符号相反的气泡解之间的相互作用。
AI.method: 受Martel-Raphaël关于二维质量临界NLS方程类似问题的技术启发，构建包含非局部化剖面的精细化近似解，深入理解孤子与这些剖面之间的相互作用。
AI.result: 成功证明了质量临界广义KdV方程存在全局解，该解在无限时间内爆破并趋近于两个符号相反、解耦的气泡之和。
AI.conclusion: 通过克服与尺度相关的不稳定方向被非线性相互作用激发的困难，建立了质量临界广义KdV方程中多气泡无限时间爆破解的存在性。

title: A comment on an $L^\frac{2n}{n+2}-L^\frac{2n}{n-2}$ Carleman inequality in relation to "the determination of an unbounded potential from Cauchy data"
summary: The proof of \cite[Proposition 2.1]{DKS}[arXiv:1104.0232] is partially incorrect. In this short note, we provide a new proof, which requires an additional hypothesis. A modification of this new proof also corrects the proof of \cite[Proposition 2.1]{Ch}[arXiv:2310.17456], where the incorrect argument of \cite{DKS} has been repeated.

AI.tldr: 作者指出DKS论文中命题2.1的证明部分错误，并提供需要额外假设的新证明，同时修正了Ch论文中重复相同错误的问题
AI.motivation: 纠正DKS论文中命题2.1证明的错误，并修正Ch论文中重复相同错误的问题
AI.method: 提供新的证明方法，但需要额外假设条件；同时修改证明方法以修正Ch论文中的问题
AI.result: 成功纠正了DKS和Ch论文中的证明错误，但新证明需要更强的假设条件
AI.conclusion: 通过提供需要额外假设的新证明，修正了两篇论文中的错误，但原始命题在更弱条件下的正确性仍需验证

title: On putative self-similarity for incompressible 3D Euler
summary: We consider hypothetical solutions of 3D Euler which blow up in finite time in a self-similar fashion. We prove that if the initial data has finite kinetic energy, then the similarity exponent $γ$ which governs the rate of zooming in must be larger than $2/5$. If a smooth globally self-similar blowup profile exists, and this profile satisfies an outgoing property, we prove that $γ\geq 1/2$. For axisymmetric solutions, we establish the bound $γ\geq 1/2$ in more general settings, including ones in which the outgoing property is not present.

AI.tldr: 研究三维欧拉方程自相似爆破解的相似指数下界，证明在有限动能条件下γ>2/5，在满足外向性条件下γ≥1/2，对轴对称解得到更一般的γ≥1/2下界
AI.motivation: 研究三维欧拉方程是否存在有限时间自相似爆破解，以及这类解的性质和约束条件，特别是相似指数γ的下界估计
AI.method: 通过数学分析建立相似指数γ的下界约束：1) 基于有限动能条件证明γ>2/5；2) 在光滑全局自相似爆破解且满足外向性条件下证明γ≥1/2；3) 对轴对称解建立更一般的γ≥1/2下界，不依赖外向性条件
AI.result: 1) 有限动能条件下γ>2/5；2) 光滑全局自相似爆破解且满足外向性条件下γ≥1/2；3) 轴对称解在更一般条件下γ≥1/2
AI.conclusion: 三维欧拉方程的自相似爆破解受到相似指数的严格下界约束，这些约束条件为理解欧拉方程奇点形成机制提供了重要理论限制
